abstract: Panel of police commissioners rule that Milwaukee Police Chief Ed Flynn was justified in firing Officer Christopher Manney after he fatally shot unarmed black man Dontre Hamilton.
lead_paragraph: Milwaukee’s police chief was justified in firing a white officer who shot and killed a black man during a scuffle last April, police commissioners ruled Monday night.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Panel Upholds Firing of Officer Who Killed Homeless Man
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Panel Upholds Firing of Officer Who Killed Homeless Man

snippet: Milwaukee’s police chief was justified in firing a white officer who shot and killed a black man during a scuffle last April, police commissioners ruled Monday night.
